message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the opportunity to work with you,  $1400000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable going at this time. I'm willing to pay $1250000. This price is fair to both of us, allowing you to make a profit and me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as 1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a compromise. I'll sell the product to you for 1300000.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1300000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to offer $1275000.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as low as 1275000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for 1290000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While your offer is getting closer, $1290000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to offer $1250000 one last time. This is a very fair price that allows us both to come to an agreement and move forward.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as 1250000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for 1280000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
